text: Nao andũ a Gibeoni magĩtũmanĩra Joshua o kũu Giligali kambĩ-inĩ yake, makĩmwĩra atĩrĩ, “Ndũgatiganĩrie ndungata ciaku. Ambata, ũũke gũkũ narua nĩguo ũtũhonokie! Tũteithie nĩ ũndũ athamaki othe a Aamori arĩa matũũraga bũrũri ũrĩa ũrĩ irĩma nĩmacookanĩrĩire matũũkĩrĩre.”10:6 Kĩrĩkanĩro kĩrĩa Joshua aagĩire nakĩo na andũ a Gibeoni kĩarĩ atĩ mangĩtharĩkĩrwo Aisiraeli nĩmarĩmateithagia.
